creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract image; white ground; green, black and blue hatched areas at right; painterly brushstrokes with blended colors at left: yellow with brown, orange and white, green, red with grey; yellow and peach areas at right; thick white-on-white horizontal brushstrokes in LLQ
signed: on back in pencil and burned into wood: Pia Fries / PIA FRIES / 2019
title: parapylon 9
